question.text:
Geef bij elke plaats aan welke zin daar hoort.
Noteer de letter van de zin achter elk nummer op het antwoordblad.
Let op: er blijven twee zinnen over.
a Fortunately, most climbers carry toilet bags which can be disposed of in special drums on the mountain.
b In which case the mountain would be a little less brown and a little more green.
c The litter becomes visible when the snow melts, which makes cleaning it up easier.
d The run-off of dumping sites is infiltrating the region's water channels, some of which feed into wells that supply drinking water.
e They have created a mountain of faeces, which is becoming an environmental problem.

content_context.text: Drie van de onderstaande vijf zinnen (a, b, c, d en e) zijn weggelaten uit de tekst (zie 2-1, 2-2 en 2-3).
